statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDateYn , AA.OrderAddYearYn , AA.OrderNoDigit , AA.OptionYn , AA.OptionFormat , AA.OrderLine , AA.AccountLine
FROM dbo.TChannelSetting AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannelSetting AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TChannelSetting ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ChannelID, OrderDateYn, OrderAddYearYn, OrderNoDigit, OptionYn, OptionFormat, OrderLine, AccountLine ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ChannelID#, #OrderDateYn#, #OrderAddYearYn#, #OrderNoDigit#, #OptionYn#, #OptionFormat#, #OrderLine#, #AccountLine# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TChannelSetting SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ChannelID = #ChannelID# , OrderDateYn = #OrderDateYn# , OrderAddYearYn = #OrderAddYearYn# , OrderNoDigit = #OrderNoDigit# , OptionYn = #OptionYn# , OptionFormat = #OptionFormat# , OrderLine = #OrderLine# , AccountLine = #AccountLine# WHERE ID = #ID#
